接口的使用
javax.servlet.ServletConfig

  • 使用ServletConfig的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    javax.servlet
    The javax.servlet package contains a number of classes and interfaces that describe and define the contracts between a servlet class and the runtime environment provided for an instance of such a class by a conforming servlet container.
    javax.servlet.http
    The javax.servlet.http package contains a number of classes and interfaces that describe and define the contracts between a servlet class running under the HTTP protocol and the runtime environment provided for an instance of such a class by a conforming servlet container.
    javax.servlet.jsp
    Classes and interfaces for the Core JSP 2.0 API.
    org.apache.catalina.core  
    org.apache.catalina.manager  
    org.apache.catalina.manager.host  
    org.apache.catalina.servlets
    This package contains Servlets that implement some of the standard functionality provided by the Catalina servlet container.
    org.apache.catalina.ssi
    This package contains code that is used by the SsiInvoker.
    org.apache.catalina.startup  
    org.apache.catalina.websocket  
    org.apache.jasper  
    org.apache.jasper.runtime  
    org.apache.jasper.servlet  

    • javax.servlet中ServletConfig的使用

      实现ServletConfig的javax.servlet中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  GenericServlet
      Defines a generic, protocol-independent servlet.
      返回ServletConfig的javax.servlet中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ServletConfig Servlet.getServletConfig()
      Returns a ServletConfig object, which contains initialization and startup parameters for this servlet.
      ServletConfig GenericServlet.getServletConfig()
      Returns this servlet's ServletConfig object.
      参数类型为ServletConfig的javax.servlet中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Servlet.init(ServletConfig config)
      Called by the servlet container to indicate to a servlet that the servlet is being placed into service.
      void GenericServlet.init(ServletConfig config)
      Called by the servlet container to indicate to a servlet that the servlet is being placed into service.

    • javax.servlet.http中ServletConfig的使用

      实现ServletConfig的javax.servlet.http中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  HttpServlet
      Provides an abstract class to be subclassed to create an HTTP servlet suitable for a Web site.

    • javax.servlet.jsp中ServletConfig的使用

      返回ServletConfig的javax.servlet.jsp中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      abstract ServletConfig PageContext.getServletConfig()
      The ServletConfig instance.

    • org.apache.catalina.core中ServletConfig的使用

      实现ServletConfig的org.apache.catalina.core中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  StandardWrapper
      Standard implementation of the Wrapper interface that represents an individual servlet definition.
      class  StandardWrapperFacade
      Facade for the StandardWrapper object.

    • org.apache.catalina.manager中ServletConfig的使用

      实现ServletConfig的org.apache.catalina.manager中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  HTMLManagerServlet
      Servlet that enables remote management of the web applications deployed within the same virtual host as this web application is.
      class  JMXProxyServlet
      This servlet will dump JMX attributes in a simple format and implement proxy services for modeler.
      class  ManagerServlet
      Servlet that enables remote management of the web applications installed within the same virtual host as this web application is.
      class  StatusManagerServlet
      This servlet will display a complete status of the HTTP/1.1 connector.

    • org.apache.catalina.manager.host中ServletConfig的使用

      实现ServletConfig的org.apache.catalina.manager.host中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  HostManagerServlet
      Servlet that enables remote management of the virtual hosts installed on the server.
      class  HTMLHostManagerServlet
      Servlet that enables remote management of the virtual hosts deployed on the server.

    • org.apache.catalina.servlets中ServletConfig的使用

      实现ServletConfig的org.apache.catalina.servlets中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  CGIServlet
      CGI-invoking servlet for web applications, used to execute scripts which comply to the Common Gateway Interface (CGI) specification and are named in the path-info used to invoke this servlet.
      class  DefaultServlet
      The default resource-serving servlet for most web applications, used to serve static resources such as HTML pages and images.
      class  WebdavServlet
      Servlet which adds support for WebDAV level 2.
      参数类型为ServletConfig的org.apache.catalina.servlets中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void CGIServlet.init(ServletConfig config)
      Sets instance variables.

    • org.apache.catalina.ssi中ServletConfig的使用

      实现ServletConfig的org.apache.catalina.ssi中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  SSIServlet
      Servlet to process SSI requests within a webpage.

    • org.apache.catalina.startup中ServletConfig的使用

      实现ServletConfig的org.apache.catalina.startup中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  Tomcat.ExistingStandardWrapper
      Helper class for wrapping existing servlets.

    • org.apache.catalina.websocket中ServletConfig的使用

      实现ServletConfig的org.apache.catalina.websocket中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  WebSocketServlet
      已过时。 
      Replaced by the JSR356 WebSocket 1.1 implementation and will be removed in Tomcat 8.0.x.

    • org.apache.jasper中ServletConfig的使用

      参数类型为ServletConfig的org.apache.jasper中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      EmbeddedServletOptions(ServletConfig config, ServletContext context)
      Create an EmbeddedServletOptions object using data available from ServletConfig and ServletContext.

      This is the super class of all JSP-generated servlets.
